text: In this file photo, Jamie Foxx attends the ` ` Annie'' Cast Photo Call at Crosby Street Hotel on Dec. 4, 2014, in New York City. Jamie Foxx is under fire from deaf stars and activists Nyle DiMarco and Marlee Matlin for allegedly mocking sign language during his recent appearance on ` ` The Tonight Show.'' Foxx's rep had no immediate comment. In a clip from Thursday's show, shared online over Memorial Day Weekend, he is seen making hand gestures as host Jimmy Fallon tosses to a commercial break.
